titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony in United States of America v. Vincent J. Fumo, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/26/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes David Urban, a former employee of the office of Senator Arlen Specter, to testify in United States of America v. Vincent J. Fumo, et al., except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted.
